The pool area is absolutely breath taking

Plenty of hanging space for clothing and even though the number of hangers was limited a quick phone call to housekeeping and I soon had all the hangers I could nedI spent the afternoon of my first day at the hotel relaxing by the pool

If it is all night pool parties your after then look no further this hotel has a really bad smell throughout beds are really uncomfortable and staff hanging around the entrance to the hotel smoking unprofessional to say the least if you are travelling as a family do not stay here
Pool area was covered for the weekend we should have been notified before we booked

They even Upgraded me to a pool view room
There was also an offer to get us into another hotels pool but that was not a suitable substitute to us
1: The visitors from other hotels came in to share the pool
The pool bar is just great and I love the West Hollywood location although it may be a little grungy for some

Beaut setting great vibes lovely staff exquisite cocktails yum food awesome views cool pool
